Validation Method: Tests pass, design reviewed

Definition of Done: Account aggregate implemented with value objects, repository, domain services
KPIs: Design approved, unit tests ≥90% coverage, repository API stable
Validation Method: Tests pass, design reviewed

Definition of Done: Opportunity aggregate implemented with value objects, repository, domain services
KPIs: Design approved, unit tests ≥90% coverage, repository API stable
Validation Method: Tests pass, design reviewed

Definition of Done: Task aggregate implemented with value objects, repository, domain services
KPIs: Design approved, unit tests ≥90% coverage, repository API stable

Description: Define Hexagonal module boundaries + create canonical packages/application + packages/adapters skeleton
Pre-requisites: Domain model for all entities implemented
Definition of Done: Application layer created (ports + use-cases); adapters layer created; module boundary rules enforced in CI; architecture tests passing; ADR updated
KPIs: No domain code depends on infrastructure, 100% adapters tested
Artifacts To Track: packages/application/src/ports/*, packages/application/src/usecases/*, packages/adapters/src/*, tests/architecture/*, docs/architecture/hex-boundaries.md, docs/architecture/repo-layout.md
Validation Method: Tests pass, architecture review

Definition of Done: Repository implementations for all aggregates with Prisma, factories for entity creation
KPIs: Repositories integrated with Prisma, tests coverage >90%
Validation Method: Unit tests pass, queries optimized

Definition of Done: Domain services implemented for leads, contacts, accounts, opportunities, tasks
KPIs: All business rules enforced, 90% test coverage
Validation Method: Integration tests pass

Description: Define TDD Process, Coverage & Review Checklist
Definition of Done: TDD guidelines documented, coverage threshold 90% enforced via CI, code review checklist established
KPIs: Coverage ≥90%, zero lint errors, code review time <24h
Validation Method: CI fails when coverage <90%, guidelines published

Description: Write Unit & Integration Tests for Domain Entities
Definition of Done: All domain entities have unit and integration tests covering business logic and repository operations
KPIs: Coverage ≥90%, tests passing in CI
Validation Method: Test reports, coverage metrics

Description: Set up SonarQube and integrate static analysis into CI/CD
Definition of Done: SonarQube server running, CI pipeline pushes analysis, quality gates defined with OWASP and Clean Code rules
KPIs: Sonar quality gate >= A, zero blocker issues
Validation Method: Sonar reports show A rating, pipeline passes when quality gate satisfied

Description: Implement blue/green deployment and rollback strategy
Definition of Done: Blue/green deployment pipeline configured, automated health checks, rollback scripts ready
KPIs: Deployment switch <1m, no downtime
Validation Method: Canary tested, rollback verified

Description: Implement secrets management and encryption at rest and in transit
Definition of Done: Secrets stored in vault, encrypted connections (TLS/mTLS), data encryption implemented
KPIs: No secrets in repo, 100% encrypted endpoints
Validation Method: Secrets scan passes, encryption verified

Description: Implement API rate limiting and DDoS protection
Definition of Done: Rate limiting middleware in API, WAF configured for DDoS, tests for request bursts
KPIs: No request saturates system, response stable under load
Validation Method: Load tests show throttling, WAF blocks malicious traffic

Description: Setup backups and disaster recovery plan
Definition of Done: Automated backups scheduled, restore scripts tested, DR documentation prepared
KPIs: RPO <5m, RTO <30m, backup success rate 100%
Validation Method: Simulated recovery successful

Description: Instrument application with OpenTelemetry, unify logs, metrics and traces
Definition of Done: All services emit structured logs, traces and metrics; dashboards and alerts created; SLOs defined
KPIs: MTTD <2min; 100% services instrumented
Validation Method: Observability shows complete traces, alerts triggered on anomalies

Description: Monitor AI models for drift, latency, hallucination and ROI
Definition of Done: Metrics collected for AI models; dashboards show drift/hallucination; alerts configured
KPIs: Drift detected within 1 day, hallucination rate <5%, ROI tracked
Validation Method: Drift simulation triggers alert; dashboard displays metrics

Description: Establish and maintain a risk register with mitigation actions
Definition of Done: Risk register created, risks scored by impact/likelihood, mitigation owners assigned; review scheduled per sprint
KPIs: All identified risks tracked, mitigation actions completed on time
Validation Method: Risk review sessions held; register updated; no untracked risks

Description: Define recurring backlog refinement, sprint planning, review and retrospective ceremonies
Definition of Done: Ceremony schedule published; agendas and templates created; meeting outcomes documented
KPIs: Backlog refined ahead of sprint; retro action items completed; schedule adherence 100%
Validation Method: Meetings occur on schedule; backlog ready; actions tracked

Description: Implement password reset and email verification flows
Definition of Done: Users can request password reset, receive secure token, reset password; email verification link sent on sign up
KPIs: Reset/verification flows succeed <30s, security tests pass
Validation Method: E2E tests pass, tokens expire, emails delivered

Description: Implement SSO (SAML/OAuth) and social login providers
Definition of Done: Users can sign in via Google, Microsoft, etc.; SAML integration with enterprise providers
KPIs: SSO login <2s, error rate <1%
Validation Method: E2E tests pass; identity tokens validated; scopes correct

Description: Add MFA using TOTP or SMS and allow users to enable/disable from security settings
Definition of Done: MFA enrollment, challenge, backup codes implemented
KPIs: MFA adoption >50%, bypass not possible
Validation Method: E2E tests simulate MFA flows; backup codes regenerate; bypass blocked

Description: Schedule periodic secret rotation and dependency vulnerability updates
Definition of Done: Rotations automated via CI; dependencies scanned weekly; patches applied
KPIs: No outdated secrets; CVE remediation within SLA
Validation Method: Rotation logs verified; dependency updates merge automatically; no stale secrets

Description: Implement circuit breaker and retry policies for external service calls
Definition of Done: Circuit breaker library integrated; retries with exponential backoff; fallback strategies defined
KPIs: Error rate reduced by 50%; no cascading failures
Validation Method: Chaos tests show successful failover; metrics confirm improvements

Description: Design caching strategy (Redis/CDN) and tune Prisma queries
Definition of Done: Layered caching added, critical queries optimized, cache invalidation strategy documented
KPIs: p99 latency reduced 30%, cache hit rate >90%
Validation Method: Benchmarks confirm improvements; no stale data

Description: Encrypt and aggregate audit logs; automate compliance reporting
Definition of Done: Audit logs encrypted and stored centrally; scheduled exports for compliance frameworks; data minimization applied
KPIs: Audit retention meets regulatory needs; report generation automated
Validation Method: Compliance auditor verifies reports; logs decryptable by authorized roles only

Description: Add in‑app onboarding, guided product tours and feedback collection
Definition of Done: Users see guided tours on first login; ability to replay; feedback widget integrated
KPIs: Onboarding completion >70%; NPS score improvement
Validation Method: User testing shows clarity; analytics confirm completion rate

Description: Implement guardrails for prompt injection, data leakage, and monitor AI bias
Definition of Done: Prompt sanitization, output redaction, bias detection metrics; incidents logged
KPIs: Zero prompt injection incidents; bias score below threshold
Validation Method: Security tests simulate injections; bias tests executed; logs verified

Description: Continuously maintain ADR registry and developer guide updates
Definition of Done: All significant design decisions captured via ADRs; developer guide updated per sprint
KPIs: ADR coverage 100%; developer satisfaction >80%
Validation Method: ADR reviews complete; doc site updated

Description: Implement tenant isolation at database and application layers
Definition of Done: Row‑level security policies applied; tenant context enforced in services; per‑tenant resource limits
KPIs: No cross‑tenant data access; isolation tests pass
Validation Method: Penetration tests confirm isolation

Description: Establish AI output review and manual fallback processes
Definition of Done: All AI-generated outputs (code, tests, docs) reviewed by humans; fallback processes documented and tested
KPIs: AI suggestions accepted vs rejected ratio tracked; zero regressions from AI outputs
Validation Method: Review logs show compliance; fallback used when necessary

Description: Write UI and contract tests for core pages and tRPC endpoints
Definition of Done: Playwright/Cypress tests cover navigation, forms, interactive components; contract tests validate tRPC endpoints
KPIs: Coverage ≥90%, tests run <5min
Validation Method: Test suites pass; coverage reports meet thresholds

Description: Release governance: staging auto-deploy, promotion policy, quality/security gates, rollback criteria
Definition of Done: Promotion workflow documented; staging deploy automated; prod promotion requires gate pass + approval; rollback playbook defined; release checklist template in repo
KPIs: Staging deploy success >=95%; prod promotion time <=30 min; rollback tested in staging
Validation Method: Dry-run release executed to staging; simulated rollback executed; checklist reviewed

Description: Architecture boundary enforcement: domain/infrastructure dependency rules + architecture tests in CI
Definition of Done: Module boundaries enforced; forbidden dependency rules added; architecture tests run in CI; documentation + ADR added
KPIs: 0 boundary violations on main; CI blocks non-compliant changes
Validation Method: Introduce intentional violation and confirm CI fails; review with architecture checklist

Description: Supply chain security: dependency pinning + SBOM generation in CI (npm/pnpm + container)
Pre-requisites: CI pipeline available; container build defined
Definition of Done: Dependencies pinned/locked; SBOM generated per build; SBOM stored as artifact; baseline policy documented
KPIs: 100% builds produce SBOM; 0 unsigned/untracked dependency changes merged
Validation Method: CI run produces SBOM; verify SBOM content and retention; review policy

Description: Supply chain security: artifact signing + provenance for build outputs (images + releases)
Pre-requisites: SBOM generation in place; registry access configured
Definition of Done: Artifacts signed; verification step added; provenance attached; docs updated
KPIs: 100% prod-bound artifacts signed; verification enforced in deployment pipeline
Validation Method: Signed artifact verified in CI and deployment; tamper test fails as expected

Description: Container/image scanning in CI and registry with fail-on-critical policy
Definition of Done: Image scan runs on every build; policy blocks critical vulns; exceptions process documented
KPIs: 0 critical vulns in prod images; scan coverage 100% for deployable images
Validation Method: CI blocks image with known critical vuln; report archived

Description: Create ADR pack for multi-tenancy; workflow engine choice; agent tool-calling; data classification & retention; audit logging
Pre-requisites: Domain model established; architecture spike complete
Definition of Done: ADRs drafted for multi-tenancy; workflow engine; tool-calling model; data classification/retention; audit logging; reviewed and approved
KPIs: 100% ADR coverage; stakeholder approval recorded
Artifacts To Track: docs/adr/adr-multi-tenancy.md, docs/adr/adr-workflow-engine.md, docs/adr/adr-agent-tools.md, docs/adr/adr-data-governance.md, docs/adr/adr-audit-logging.md, artifacts/misc/adr-index.csv
Validation Method: ADR review meeting minutes; stakeholder approval recorded

Description: Implement Case/Matter aggregate root with tasks; deadlines; parties; lawyer assignments
Pre-requisites: DDD model finalized; tRPC API foundation ready
Definition of Done: Case/Matter entities created with invariants; repositories and services implemented; CRUD endpoints via tRPC; unit and integration tests pass
KPIs: Coverage >=90%; response time <=50ms; correctness validated
Validation Method: Integration tests passing; manual QA of CRUD flows; review by domain architect

Description: Develop Appointment aggregate with conflict detection; buffers; recurrence; linkage to cases and calendars
Pre-requisites: Calendar provider research; case domain implemented
Definition of Done: Appointment aggregate, services and repositories implemented; conflict detection logic with unit tests; recurrence rules; APIs via tRPC; scheduling integrated with case management
KPIs: Conflict detection accuracy >95%; scheduling latency <=100ms; test coverage >=90%
Validation Method: Conflict scenarios tested; load tests confirm latency; manual booking flows validated

Description: Integrate external calendar providers (Google/Microsoft) with bidirectional sync; webhook handling; idempotency; reconciliation
Pre-requisites: OAuth credentials obtained; appointment domain stable
Definition of Done: Google and Microsoft calendar integrations implemented; event sync both directions with idempotency keys; reconcilers handle conflicts; error handling and retries; integration tests
KPIs: Sync reliability >=99%; duplicate events <1%; sync latency <30s
Validation Method: Simulated event sync and conflict resolution; reliability metrics monitored

Description: Expose application services as agent tools and implement human approval flows with preview and rollback for high-risk actions
Pre-requisites: Agent infrastructure ready; tRPC endpoints stable
Definition of Done: Agent tools for search; create; update case and appointments and draft messages; approval UI with diff preview; rollback mechanism; authorization checks; logging; tests
KPIs: 100% tool actions authorized; zero unauthorized writes; user approval latency <30s
Validation Method: End-to-end tests simulate agent actions; manual review; audit logs inspected

Description: Implement data governance workflows: DSAR requests; retention & legal hold policies; tenant-specific encryption key management; data residency compliance
Pre-requisites: Data classification policy defined; KMS configured
Definition of Done: DSAR workflow implemented with identity verification; retention schedules enforced per entity; legal hold exceptions; per-tenant key management with rotation; residency controls and subprocessor registry; documentation and tests
KPIs: DSAR turnaround <7 days; encryption coverage 100%; retention and legal hold compliance audited
Validation Method: Mock DSAR processed; retention jobs run; encryption keys rotated; compliance audit passes

Description: Evaluate n8n; custom engine; and Temporal; document decision via ADR; build event-driven minimal rules engine and integrate selected workflow engine
Definition of Done: Comparative analysis of workflow options; ADR published; POC implemented; events published for case status changes; selected engine integrated to process simple workflows; training delivered
KPIs: Decision ratified; POC demonstrates reliability; workflow execution success rate >95%
Validation Method: ADR reviewed; POC results documented; event-driven flow tested

Description: Define SLOs/SLIs and alerting; establish on-call and incident management process; conduct restore drills; create capacity and cost budgets for AI inference and search
Pre-requisites: Observability and monitoring in place; cost tracking metrics available
Definition of Done: SLOs and SLIs defined for core services; alert rules configured; on-call rota established with escalation policies; incident runbook prepared; restore drill executed successfully; budgets defined and monitored
KPIs: On-call response <15 minutes; restoration time <1 hour; cost deviation <10% of budget; SLO adherence >=99%
Artifacts To Track: docs/operations/slo-definitions.md, artifacts/misc/alerts-config.yaml, artifacts/misc/oncall-schedule.json, docs/operations/incident-runbook.md, docs/operations/restore-drill-report.md, artifacts/reports/cost-budget.xlsx
Validation Method: Drills executed; metrics dashboards confirm SLOs; budgets reviewed; incident simulation completed

Description: Perform threat modeling and abuse-case analysis for multi-tenancy and agent tool-calling; design mitigations; schedule penetration test; implement cookie consent mechanism
Pre-requisites: Architecture diagrams and data flows available
Definition of Done: Threat model documented; abuse cases enumerated; mitigation tasks created; penetration test executed and findings triaged; cookie consent banner implemented; compliance checks passed
KPIs: All critical threats mitigated; pen test high severity issues <5; cookie compliance tests pass
Validation Method: Threat model reviewed; pen test results validated; cookie banner tested across browsers; compliance attestation

Description: Design and implement inbound/outbound email flows: SPF/DKIM/DMARC; inbound parsing; attachments; implement general webhook handling with idempotency and retries; publish public API specification (OpenAPI) with versioning; baseline inbound email feature delivered
Pre-requisites: Domain events defined; messaging port identified
Definition of Done: Outbound emails signed with SPF/DKIM/DMARC configured; inbound email parser implemented with attachments handling; webhooks infrastructure with idempotency and retries; OpenAPI spec version 1 published covering major endpoints; baseline email send/receive tested
KPIs: Outbound deliverability >=95%; inbound parse accuracy >=99%; API spec coverage 100%; zero duplicate webhook processing
Validation Method: Emails delivered and parsed; DMARC reports show pass; webhook tests simulate duplicates; API spec validated by tools

Description: Plan and execute legacy system migration: discover and map data; assess data quality; design migration scripts; run rehearsals and reconciliation reporting; finalize cutover with rollback plan
Pre-requisites: Access to legacy data; mapping to new domain
Definition of Done: Data mapping documents created; migration scripts developed and tested; rehearsal migration executed with reconciliation reports; cutover plan created with rollback procedure; final migration executed with acceptance of accuracy and completeness
KPIs: Data completeness >=99%; no critical data loss; migration downtime <4 hours; reconciliation accuracy verified
Validation Method: Rehearsal results reviewed; final migration verified by stakeholders; rollback procedure tested

Description: Define PRD and user journey templates; create Definition of Ready criteria; develop traceability matrix linking capabilities to domain services; APIs; UIs; and tests
Pre-requisites: Feasibility assessment; sprint planning AI predictions
Definition of Done: PRD templates available and used; user journey mapping methodology defined; DoR criteria documented and adopted; traceability matrix tool or document created and applied to backlog; backlog items updated
KPIs: 100% new stories include PRD and meet DoR; traceability coverage >=90%; backlog management efficiency improved
Validation Method: Sample stories reviewed; DoR used; traceability matrix cross-checked; training session feedback

Description: Develop Case timeline UI with deadline engine: display tasks; deadlines; events; implement deadline engine to compute legal deadlines and reminders; integrate with scheduling
Pre-requisites: Case and appointment APIs; UI design ready
Definition of Done: Case timeline page implemented; tasks and deadlines displayed chronologically; deadline engine computes due dates; reminders triggered; E2E tests; accessibility compliance
KPIs: Timeline load time <1s; deadline accuracy >=95%; user adoption rate; test coverage >=90%
Validation Method: User testing; functional tests; performance analysis; legal accuracy review

Description: Implement conversation record entity: store chat transcripts; tool calls; actions per case; enable search and retrieval; integrate audit logging and data retention policies
Definition of Done: Database schema created; conversation records stored with metadata (case ID; timestamps; user/agent ID; tool calls); search API implemented; access control enforced; retention and DSAR compliance built-in; tests covering privacy controls
KPIs: 100% conversations recorded; retrieval latency <=50ms; access control passes; DSAR deletion executed
Validation Method: Unit and integration tests; manual search; DSAR deletion tested; audit logs verified

Description: Implement action preview and rollback UI for agent-initiated changes; integrated with approval flows
Pre-requisites: Agent tools implemented; case timeline UI built
Definition of Done: Approval page displays proposed changes with diff; users can approve; modify; or reject; rollback resets state and logs actions; E2E tests; analytics track approvals
KPIs: 100% agent actions previewed; zero unauthorized changes; approval rate and latency tracked
Validation Method: Manual testing of diff preview; rollback tested; analytics dashboards review

Description: Implement Secrets Management (e.g., HashiCorp Vault) for API Keys (OpenAI, etc.).
Pre-requisites: Secrets Management tool selected, AI access credentials secured
Definition of Done: All API keys are stored in a secure vault, access is restricted via IAM/RBAC, and agents retrieve secrets programmatically.
KPIs: Zero secrets in code/config files, 100% programmatic access, audit log active.
Artifacts To Track: Vault server running at http://127.0.0.1:8200, Root token and unseal key secured
Validation Method: Vault server running in dev mode, API accessible, root token generated

Description: Domain events infrastructure: event contracts + versioning + outbox pattern + idempotent publishing
Pre-requisites: DDD model available; repository layer established; observability baseline
Definition of Done: Event contract catalogue created (schema + versioning); transactional outbox implemented; idempotency keys enforced; publisher emits metrics/traces; unit/integration tests
KPIs: 0 lost events in tests; publish latency p95 <200ms; 100% events schema-validated
Validation Method: Integration tests validate outbox consistency; duplicate publish prevented; dashboards show event flow

Description: Event consumers framework: retries + DLQ + backoff + observability; standard webhook/idempotency utilities
Pre-requisites: Event publisher in place; monitoring/alerts configured
Definition of Done: Consumer SDK supports retries/backoff; DLQ storage/triage workflow; idempotent handlers; poison-message handling; metrics and alerts; chaos tests
KPIs: DLQ drain success >95%; retry success >90%; MTTR for consumer incidents <30 min
Validation Method: Chaos tests inject failures; DLQ receives poison messages; alerts fire; handlers remain idempotent

Description: Case document model: storage metadata, versioning, ACL mapping (tenant + case + role), and audit hooks
Pre-requisites: Case/Matter domain exists; tenant isolation enforced; base document management available
Definition of Done: CaseDocument aggregate and repository implemented; ACL mapping rules defined; versioning semantics; audit events on read/write; tests
KPIs: Access control test pass 100%; audit log coverage 100%; CRUD latency p95 <50ms
Validation Method: Isolation tests prove tenant/case scoping; audit entries present for all actions; API contract tests pass

Description: Ingestion pipeline for case files: upload/email attachment intake, antivirus scan, metadata extraction, storage, and indexing triggers
Pre-requisites: Object storage configured; email inbound baseline; event consumers available
Definition of Done: Upload + inbound email attachments land in storage; AV scan gate; metadata extracted; ingestion events emitted; failure handling + retries; integration tests
KPIs: Ingestion success >=99%; AV scan blocks 100% known samples; duplicate ingestion rate <1%
Validation Method: E2E ingest from UI + inbound email; malicious sample blocked; retries succeed; ingestion metrics visible

Description: OCR + text extraction worker for scanned PDFs/images; normalized text artifacts stored for search and RAG
Pre-requisites: Worker runtime provisioned; file ingestion events available
Definition of Done: OCR worker processes supported formats; stores extracted text with provenance; handles retries; quality metrics recorded; tests
KPIs: OCR throughput >= X pages/min baseline; extraction accuracy benchmarked; failure rate <1%
Validation Method: Benchmark run against sample corpus; extraction stored and searchable; retries verified

Description: Permissioned indexing for case documents and notes: full-text + embeddings with tenant/case ACL filters
Pre-requisites: pgvector enabled; ACL model implemented; extracted text available
Definition of Done: FTS index and vector embeddings built; retrieval APIs enforce tenant/case ACL; re-index job; purge on DSAR rules; tests
KPIs: Retrieval latency p95 <200ms; zero cross-tenant leakage; relevance eval >=80% on test set
Validation Method: Automated tests prove ACL enforcement; relevance suite runs in CI; load test meets latency

Description: Case RAG tool: agent retrieval tool constrained by tenant/case permissions; citations + source trace; prompt-injection hardening for retrieved content
Pre-requisites: Agent tool-calling exists; guardrails baseline; permissioned retrieval APIs available
Definition of Done: Agent tool implemented (retrieve_case_context); responses include source references; injection defenses applied; approval needed for external send; tests
KPIs: 0 unauthorized retrievals; response time p95 <2s; hallucination rate reduced via eval suite
Validation Method: Red-team prompts blocked; eval suite passes; tool logs show tenant/case scoping

Description: Notification service MVP: unified delivery (in-app + email) with preference model (backend), templates, and audit logging
Pre-requisites: Email outbound configured; audit logging present; event consumer framework ready
Definition of Done: Notification domain + templates implemented; delivery adapters; preference defaults stored; audit entries; retries/DLQ; tests
KPIs: Delivery success >=99%; template rendering errors 0 in CI; audit coverage 100%
Validation Method: Send test notifications; simulate provider failure; retries succeed; audit logs validated

Description: Scheduling communications: ICS invites, reschedule/cancel flows, reminders; integrated with notification service and calendar sync
Pre-requisites: Calendar sync stable; notification service MVP available; appointment aggregate ready
Definition of Done: ICS generation and delivery implemented; reschedule/cancel semantics correct; reminders scheduled; audit trail; integration tests
KPIs: Invite delivery >=95%; reminder delivery >=99%; zero duplicate invites on retries
Validation Method: E2E booking sends invite; reschedule updates; cancel notifies; retry does not duplicate

Description: Case timeline enrichment: include documents/versions, communications (email/WhatsApp), and agent actions/approvals as timeline events
Pre-requisites: Timeline UI exists; ingestion pipeline available; comms and agent actions recorded
Definition of Done: Timeline shows unified chronological events (tasks/deadlines/docs/comms/agent actions); filters; permissions enforced; E2E tests
KPIs: Timeline load <1s; user task completion improved; 0 unauthorized events visible
Validation Method: User testing validates readability; E2E tests cover permissions; performance checks pass

Description: Artifact path conventions + CI lint to prevent repo drift
Pre-requisites: Canonical repo layout agreed; planning templates in place
Definition of Done: Repo artifact conventions documented; artifact-path linter added; CI blocks non-canonical artifact paths; move-map template provided
KPIs: 0 artifact path violations on main; lint runtime <60s; 100% new PRs checked
Validation Method: Run artifact-lint in CI; introduce an invalid artifact path and confirm CI fails; review migration map completeness

Description: Standardize worker runtime under apps/workers (events, ingestion, notifications) with shared job framework, metrics, and deployment packaging
Pre-requisites: Event infrastructure and ingestion triggers defined; deployment pipeline ready
Definition of Done: apps/workers structure created; workers run with shared configuration and telemetry; queues configured; health checks and dashboards added; deployment artifacts produced; restore/replay procedures documented
KPIs: Worker job success >=99%; processing latency p95 <30s; 100% workers emit traces/metrics/logs
Validation Method: Run workers locally via docker-compose; simulate outbox publish and ingestion triggers; verify dashboards populate; chaos test restart and confirm idempotent resume
